DellPCIeSSD.description: An instance of DellPCIeSSD will have PCIe Solid State Drive specific data.
DellPCIeSSD.longDescription: An instance of DellPCIeSSD will have PCIe Solid State Drive specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AvailableSparePercent.description: This property represents the percentage of the remaining spare capacity available.
AvailableSparePercent.longDescription: This property represents the percentage of the remaining spare capacity available.

Bus.description: This property represents the PCI bus.
Bus.longDescription: This property represents the PCI bus.

BusProtocol.description: This property represents the bus protocol.
BusProtocol.longDescription: This property represents the bus protocol.

CryptographicEraseCapable.description: This property represents the storage component cryptographic erase capability.
CryptographicEraseCapable.longDescription: This property represents the storage component cryptographic erase capability.

Device.description: This property represents the PCI device.
Device.longDescription: This property represents the PCI device.

DeviceProtocol.description: This property indicates the device protocol. For example, NVMe 1.1, NVMe 1.2 and so on.
DeviceProtocol.longDescription: This property indicates the device protocol. For example, NVMe 1.1, NVMe 1.2 and so on.

DeviceSidebandProtocol.description: This property indicates the device sideband protocol.
DeviceSidebandProtocol.longDescription: This property indicates the device sideband protocol.

DriveFormFactor.description: This property represents the physical disk form factor and is one of the following values: 0 - Unknown, 1 - 1.8 inch, 2 - 2.5 inch, 3 - 3.5 inch, 4-2.5 inch Add-in card, 5-M.2 , 6-EDSFF-E1.L, 7-E3.S, 8-E3.S 2T, 9-E3.L, 10-E3.L.2T.
DriveFormFactor.longDescription: This property represents the physical disk form factor and is one of the following values: 0 - Unknown, 1 - 1.8 inch, 2 - 2.5 inch, 3 - 3.5 inch, 4-2.5 inch Add-in card, 5-M.2 , 6-EDSFF-E1.L, 7-E3.S, 8-E3.S 2T, 9-E3.L, 10-E3.L.2T.

DriveState.description: This property displays the current state of the device or subsystem.
DriveState.longDescription: This property displays the current state of the device or subsystem.

EncryptionProtocol.description: The property provides information about the encryption protocol used to encrypt the data stored on the Drive.
EncryptionProtocol.longDescription: The property provides information about the encryption protocol used to encrypt the data stored on the Drive.

ErrorDescription.description: This property represents the Error Description of the NVMe init error
ErrorDescription.longDescription: This property represents the Error Description of the NVMe init error

ErrorRecoverable.description: This property represents NVMe init Error is Recoverable or not.
ErrorRecoverable.longDescription: This property represents NVMe init Error is Recoverable or not.

FreeSizeInBytes.description: This property represents the free space available for a virtual disk. Note: This field value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140.
FreeSizeInBytes.longDescription: This property represents the free space available for a virtual disk. Note: This field value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140.

Function.description: This property represents the PCI function.
Function.longDescription: This property represents the PCI function.

HotSpareStatus.description: This property represents the hot-spare status and is one of the following values: 0-No, 1-Dedicated, 2-Global. Note: This value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140 controller.
HotSpareStatus.longDescription: This property represents the hot-spare status and is one of the following values: 0-No, 1-Dedicated, 2-Global. Note: This value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140 controller.

MediaType.description: This property represents the drive media type.
MediaType.longDescription: This property represents the drive media type.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeCapableLinkWidth.description: The property indicates the Capable Link Width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.
PCIeCapableLinkWidth.longDescription: The property indicates the Capable Link Width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.

PCIeNegotiatedLinkWidth.description: The property indicates the Negotiated Link width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.
PCIeNegotiatedLinkWidth.longDescription: The property indicates the Negotiated Link width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.

ProductID.description: This property represents the DeviceID of the PCIe SSD.
ProductID.longDescription: This property represents the DeviceID of the PCIe SSD.

RAIDType.description: The property indicates type of RAID and indicates if the RAID is software based.
RAIDType.longDescription: The property indicates type of RAID and indicates if the RAID is software based.

RaidStatus.description: This property represents the RAID specific status.
RaidStatus.longDescription: This property represents the RAID specific status.

Slot.description: This property represents the slot where the drive is located.
Slot.longDescription: This property represents the slot where the drive is located.

SystemEraseCapability.description: The property indicates the storage component system-erase capability.
SystemEraseCapability.longDescription: The property indicates the storage component system-erase capability.

UsedSizeInBytes.description: This property indicates the space already consumed by virtual disks.
UsedSizeInBytes.longDescription: This property indicates the space already consumed by virtual disks.

WWN.description: This property represents the WWN of the drive.
WWN.longDescription: This property represents the WWN of the drive.

title: #DellPCIeSSD.v1_7_0.DellPCIeSSD
